text: Ryu Su-jong is a North Korean ice hockey player. She was a member of the Unified Korean team at the 2018 Winter Olympics, and has represented the country at multiple IIHF Division 2A Women's World Championships, including 2018 when the team won bronze. She played for the Kimchaek youth team. == References == ==External links== * Biographical information and career statistics from Elite Prospects Category:1995 births Category:Ice hockey players at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Living people Category:North Korean women's ice hockey defencemen Category:North Korean women's ice hockey players Category:Winter Olympics competitors for Korea
title: Ryu Su-jong
